question: Has ORMD-0801 been tested in patients?
ideal_answer: Yes, ORMD-0801 has been tested in patients.

snippets.text: Glucose-reducing effect of the ORMD-0801 oral insulin preparation in patients with uncontrolled type 1 diabetes: a pilot study.

In efforts to provide patients with a more compliable treatment method, Oramed Pharmaceuticals tested the capacity of its oral insulin capsule (ORMD-0801, 8 mg insulin) in addressing this resistant clinical state.
